page.title: 20SUMMARY, HAYDON BRIDGE
page.content: Lord Elliott summarizes our thanks to the B.B.C very well:"It is pleasing to be asked to contribute to Domesday 1986.I thank those responsible."We shall continue to explore our area by interview,document & map:- THOSE WHO HAVE ASSISTED MOST: ============================= Marion Sharples Ruth Hudspith George Gordon Jack Mitchell Ian Garrow Bill Tait Sarah Oliver Christine Oliver Pat Moore Technical & Vocational Initiative The Fourth Year and 100 Third year pupils **************************************
